message.content:
cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.MA, cs.NI

The paper deals with power allocation in communication systems, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The use of online learning algorithms and stochastic multi-armed bandits suggests that the paper may also belong to the machine learning (cs.LG) and control systems (cs.SY) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper involves optimization and decision-making, which are topics in the multi-agent systems (cs.MA) and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI) sub-categories.
